body.raw: We do consent with your claim statement, Ms, Paul, and are ready to support you should you choose to sue. However, please note that Tweek Tweak has a morbid passion for coffee, as it is widely known, so we also suggest you would consider the opprtunity to come to an amicable agreement with the tenant if possible.
